effect.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.
effect.full: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed. Pokémon that are immune to electric-type moves can still be paralyzed by this ability. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, there is a 50% chance that encounters will be with an electric Pokémon, if applicable.

description.diamond-pearl: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.
